textBeforeTable: Alabama location Sterling Communites by State delete Clear Filter location Show by State calendar Show by Year A community that has earned 10 Growth Awards is recognized as a Sterling Tree City USA. Sterling communities are regarded as leaders in community forestry and are often looked upon as innovators.
